## LoggingServiceSetup interface

Provides APIs to plugins for customizing the plugin's logger.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LoggingServiceSetup 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [configure(config$)](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.loggingservicesetup.configure.md) | Customizes the logging config for the plugin's context. |
